quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is to say, 'I don't want to.'
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don't be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of. One man gets only a week's value out of a year, while another man gets a full year's value out of a week.
author: Charles Richards

quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Marthe Troly-Curtin

quote: The greatest gift you can give someone is your time because when you give your time, you are giving a portion of your life that you will never get back.
author: Unknown

quote: Punctuality is not about being on time, it's about respecting your own commitments and appointments.
author: Unknown

quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: You may delay, but time will not.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time and tide wait for no man.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The sands of time are sinking, the moments swiftly pass.
author: Robert Murray M'Cheyne

quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: How did it get so late so soon?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: To choose time is to save time.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Time heals what reason cannot.
author: Seneca

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Regret for wasted time is more wasted time.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Time is the substance from which I am made. Time is a river without banks, it flows and I am the river.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: If you want to make good use of your time, you've got to know what's most important and then give it all you've got.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: There's a time for departure, even when there's no certain place to go.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
author: Hector Berlioz

quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: It's not that we have little time, but that we waste a good deal of it.
author: Seneca

quote: Time is an illusion.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
author: Aeschylus

quote: We are a product of the past, but we are a shapers of the future.
author: Unknown

quote: Time passes quickly, but memories last forever.
author: Unknown

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under the heavens.
author: Ecclesiastes 3:1

quote: Time is free, but it's priceless. You can't own it, but you can use it. You can't keep it, but you can spend it. Once you've lost it, you can never get it back.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: The more time you spend in your discomfort zone, the more your comfort zone will expand.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that's the stuff life is made of.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The strongest among us are those who can waste time, because they have so much of it.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Time makes more converts than reason.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: There is no present or future, only the past, happening over and over again—now.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: What we do today, right now, will have an accumulated effect on all our tomorrows.
author: Alexandra Stoddard

quote: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they're called memories. Some take us forward, they're called dreams.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: Time is a precious thing. Never waste it.
author: Willy Wonka (Roald Dahl)

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
author: Auguste Rodin

quote: Time passes, and with it, the chance to love, to forgive, to live.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you've come.
author: Unknown

quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Time is an excellent doctor.
author: Proverb

quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: It is not the years in your life but the life in your years that counts.
author: Adlai Stevenson

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
author: Faith Baldwin

quote: The illusion of time is a powerful force.
author: Unknown

quote: There is no royal road to anything. One thing at a time, all things in succession. That which grows fast, withers as rapidly; that which grows slowly, endures.
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Time can be a greedy thing – sometimes it steals the gifts we were meant to share.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: Time is like a river. You cannot touch the same water twice, because the flow that has passed will never pass again. Enjoy every moment of your life.
author: Unknown

quote: The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is precious, handle with prayer.
author: Unknown

quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Time is the longest distance between two places.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Never leave 'till tomorrow that which you can do today.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time is a storm in which we are all lost.
author: William Carlos Williams

quote: The cost of a thing is the amount of what I will call life which is required to be exchanged for it, immediately or in the long run.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: The past is a place of reference, not a place of residence.
author: Unknown

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Time is a game played beautifully by children.
author: Heraclitus

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
author: Faith Baldwin

quote: Time is the seed of eternity.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Time passes. Listen. Time passes. Come closer now. There is a man speaking. He is saying, 'I told you so.'
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Time is a river, the force of which is so strong it can carry you off, but it will not carry you off if you are anchored.
author: Unknown

quote: There comes a time when you have to choose between turning the page and closing the book.
author: Josh Jameson

quote: Time is that quality of awareness that makes it possible for experience to appear in a sequence.
author: Unknown

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
author: Unknown

quote: Your life is an occasion. Rise to it.
author: Suzanne Weyn

quote: Time is like a handful of sand, the more tightly you grasp it, the faster it slips through your fingers.
author: Unknown

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
author: Buddha

quote: Time is a wonderful thing, it allows us to heal and grow.
author: Unknown

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Time is the ultimate currency.
author: Unknown

quote: Lost, yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered, for they are gone forever.
author: Horace Mann

quote: Time makes us grow, makes us old, makes us forget, makes us forgive.
author: Unknown

quote: You can have it all. Just not all at once.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Time is the greatest equalizer.
author: Unknown

quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.
author: Robert H. Goddard

quote: Time is like money; the less we have of it, the more we value it.
author: Unknown

quote: The future is literally in our hands to mold as we like.
author: Sterling Hayden

quote: Time is the continuous, irreversible succession of events through which all things in the universe pass.
author: Unknown

quote: The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a person can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: What then is time? If no one asks me, I know what it is. If I wish to explain it to him who asks, I do not know.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Time is the master of us all.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Time is the great equalizer, it treats all people equally.
author: Unknown

quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Time is a river of events. It's always flowing, always changing.
author: Unknown

quote: There is a time to be born and a time to die, a time to plant and a time to uproot, a time to kill and a time to heal, a time to tear down and a time to build, a time to weep and a time to laugh, a time to mourn and a time to dance, a time to scatter stones and a time to gather them, a time to embrace and a time to refrain from embracing, a time to search and a time to give up, a time to keep and a time to throw away, a time to tear and a time to mend, a time to be silent and a time to speak, a time to love and a time to hate, a time for war and a time for peace.
author: Ecclesiastes 3:2-8

quote: Time is the space in which events occur.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Time is the stuff life is made of.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The only constant in life is change.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Time is an illusion that we have created to organize our lives.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Time is a friend to those who use it well.
author: Unknown

quote: The moments of the present are like a river that never stops flowing. Each moment is unique and will never return.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is measured in the heart.
author: Unknown

quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Time is a series of 'now' moments.
author: Unknown

quote: The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful release of our potentials is time-bound.
author: Unknown

quote: It is later than you think.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Time passes. That's the one thing you can count on.
author: Karen Thompson Walker

quote: Time is the longest distance between two points.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Time is what keeps everything from happening at once.
author: Unknown

quote: There is a time for silence and a time for speech.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is an abstract concept, a construct of the human mind.
author: Unknown

quote: The years teach much which the days never know.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Time is like a flowing river, which carries away all that is not anchored to the bank.
author: Unknown

quote: The time for fun and games is over.
author: Unknown

quote: Time, like money, can be spent, saved, and wasted.
author: Unknown

quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Time is the most valuable asset you have, don't waste it on things that don't matter.
author: Unknown

quote: The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: Time is the canvas on which we paint our lives.
author: Unknown

quote: The value of a moment is realized when it becomes a memory.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is an eternal stream, it carries everything away.
author: Unknown

quote: The present moment is always the best time to start.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is a dimension, not a destination.
author: Unknown

quote: The future is bought by the present.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Time is a thief, it steals our youth, our loved ones, and our memories.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
author: Mike Murdock

quote: Time is a paradox, it seems to fly when we are enjoying ourselves, and drag when we are not.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to escape the allure of the past is to embrace the present and anticipate the future.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is a force, it can create or destroy.
author: Unknown

quote: The longer you wait for the future, the shorter it will be.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is a gift, cherish every moment.
author: Unknown

quote: The best time to apologize is before you get caught.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is a journey, enjoy the ride.
author: Unknown

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life – to be happy – it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Time is a cycle, it repeats itself.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Time is the ultimate luxury.
author: Unknown

quote: The present is the only time over which we have any power.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet to come. The present is all we have. Live in it.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is an asset, use it wisely.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Time is a constant, our perception of it changes.
author: Unknown

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Time is an experience, not a measurement.
author: Unknown

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Time is a test, it reveals our true character.
author: Unknown

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Time is a teacher, it teaches us lessons.
author: Unknown

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Time is a healer, it mends broken hearts.
author: Unknown

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Time is a river flowing into eternity.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Time is a fleeting moment, seize it.
author: Unknown

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Time is a whisper, listen closely.
author: Unknown

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Time is a gift you give yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Time is a treasure, don't waste it.
author: Unknown

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.
author: John Milton

quote: Time is a precious commodity, use it wisely.
author: Unknown

quote: The journey is the reward.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Time is a fleeting shadow, embrace it.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Time is a constant, our perception of it changes.
author: Unknown

quote: The only thing standing between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
author: Joel Brown

quote: Time is a canvas, paint your masterpiece.
author: Unknown

quote: The past is a good place to visit, but a bad place to stay.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is a friend to those who use it well.
author: Unknown

quote: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: Time is a precious thing, never waste it.
author: Willy Wonka (Roald Dahl)

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Time is a concept, not a reality.
author: Unknown

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Time is an abstract notion, yet it governs our lives.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates

quote: Time is a mystery, it's always there, but we can't grasp it.
author: Unknown

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Time is a paradox, it expands and contracts based on our perception.
author: Unknown

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Time is a river, carrying all things to the sea of oblivion.
author: Unknown

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Time is a continuous flow, it never stops.
author: Unknown

quote: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Time is a dimension, not a sequence.
author: Unknown

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
author: Hector Berlioz

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Time is a fleeting moment, seize it.
author: Unknown

quote: The present is the only time over which we have any power.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet to come. The present is all we have. Live in it.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is an asset, use it wisely.
author: Unknown
